tweet-button"></span></a></div></div></div><h4>About This App</h4><dl class="doc-metadata-list" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/MobileSoftwareApplication"><meta itemprop="name" content="Evernote" /><meta itemprop="image" content="https://lh4.ggpht.com/YpRePJZ4TJUCdERkX-E0uUq6jhaofOS1szIejmo3DZm4oEq82AqcUpoj9FHOxFRvprU=w124" /><span itemprop="author" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Organization"><meta itemprop="name" content="Evernote Corp." /><meta itemprop="url" content="/store/apps/developer?id=Evernote+Corp." /></span><dt>Rating:</dt><dd itemprop="aggregateRating" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating"><div class="ratings goog-inline-block" title="Rating: 4.7 stars (Above average)"itemprop="ratingValue" content="4.7"><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_half_dark"></div></div>(<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="355716">355,716</span>)</dd><dt>Updated:</dt><dd><time itemprop="datePublished">July 25, 2012</time></dd><dt>Current Version:</dt><dd itemprop="softwareVersion">4.1.1</dd><dt itemprop="operatingSystems" content="Android">Requires Android:</dt><dd>1.6 and up</dd><dt>Category:</dt><dd><a href="/store/apps/category/PRODUCTIVITY?feature=category-nav">Productivity</a></dd><dt>Installs:</dt><dd itemprop="numDownloads">10,000,000 - 50,000,000<div class="normalized-daily-installs-chart" style="width: 105px;"><img src="https://chart.googleapis.com/chart?cht=lxy&amp;chd=e:AACIERGZIiKqMzO7RETMVVXdZmbud3f.iIkQmZohqqsyu7xDzM1U3d5l7u92,zMmZa0XxbbivzzlLeelLqqkkgTnnmZdQaNa0fspc4r2PkkfFgToO7u88qDfs&amp;chds=0.0,1.0&amp;chs=105x75&amp;chma=1,0,1,1&amp;chco=42b6c9ff&amp;chls=2.5,1.0,0.0&amp;chxl=0:%7C%7C1:%7C%7C2:%7C" /><p>last 30 days</p></div></dd><dt>Size:</dt><dd itemprop="fileSize">7.5M</dd><dt>Price:</dt><dd itemprop="offers" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Offer"><meta itemprop="price" content="0" />Free<span itemprop="seller" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Organization"><meta itemprop="name" content="Android" /></span></dd><dt>Content Rating:</dt><dd itemprop="contentRating">Low Maturity</dd></dl></div><div class="doc-overview"><h2>Description</h2><div id="doc-description-container"class="doc-description-collapsed"><div class="doc-description toggle-overflow-contents"><div id="doc-original-text" >Evernote turns your Android device into an extension of your brain.<p>★  New York Times ‘Top 10 Must-Have App’, Winner: TechCrunch Crunchies, Mashable Awards and the Webbys. ★  <p>Evernote is an easy-to-use, free app that helps you remember everything across all of the devices you use. Stay organized, save your ideas and improve productivity. Evernote lets you take notes, capture photos, create to-do lists, record voice reminders--and makes these notes completely searchable, whether you are at home, at work, or on the go. <p>Key Features:<br> - Sync all of your notes across the computers and devices you use<br> - Create and edit text notes, to-dos and task lists  <br> - Save, sync and share files<br> - Search for text inside images<br> - Organize notes by notebooks and tags<br> - Email notes and save tweets to your Evernote account<br> - Connect Evernote to other apps and products you use<br> - Share notes with friends and colleagues via Facebook and Twitter<br> ★ Premium feature: take notebooks offline to access them anytime<br> ★ Premium feature: allow others to edit your notebooks<br> ★ Premium feature: add a PIN lock to your Evernote app<p>Here are some ways to use Evernote for your personal and professional life:<br> - Research smarter: snap photos of whiteboards and books<br> - Take meeting and class notes, draft agendas and research notes<br> - Plan a trip: keep track of travel plans, plane tickets and passports<br> - Organize and save recipes; search by ingredients later<br> - Create a grocery list or task list and check things off as you go<br> - View web pages saved in Evernote on your desktop<br> - Capture ideas and inspiration on the go<br> - Access files and notes you create on your phone from your desktop<br> - Keep track of products and prices for comparison shopping purposes<br> - Keep finances in order: save receipts, bills and contracts<br> - Reduce paper clutter by taking snapshots of restaurant menus, business cards and labels<br> - Use Evernote as part of your GTD system to help you stay organized<br> - To get the most out of your Evernote experience, download it on all of the computers and phones that you use. <p>Evernote is available for:<br>  Desktop: Mac, Windows and Web<br>  Mobile: Android, iPhone, BlackBerry, Palm WebOS, Windows Mobile<br>  Tablet: Android, iPad<br>  Web: Evernote for Web; Web Clippers for Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Internet Explorer<p>More information about permissions at:<br><a href="http://www.google.com/url?q=http://bit.ly/mAjLuc&amp;usg=AFQjCNGhDZbDXAuQIhs_uhw6kLr0wyqKeQ" target="_blank">http://bit.ly/mAjLuc</a><p>Learn more: <a href="http://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.evernote.com/about/getting_started/&amp;usg=AFQjCNFg4JwbliUCbS1zU2sofjSf9JILVw" target="_blank">http://www.evernote.com/about/getting_started/</a><p>Supported Accessories:<br>Sony-Ericsson LiveKey - com.sonyericsson.extras.livekey<br>Sony-Ericsson LiveDock - com.sonyericsson.extras.ATTACHED</div></div><div class="doc-description-overflow"></div></div><div class="doc-description-show-all"><div class="doc-description-show-all-button toggle-overflow-button toggle-overflow-collapsed goog-inline-block" style="display: none;" tabindex="0" data-toggletarget= "doc-description-container" data-overflowclass="doc-description-collapsed"><span class="doc-description-show-more">More</span><span class="doc-description-show-less">Less</span></div></div><a href="http://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.evernote.com&usg=AFQjCNE-NRTbHrz_iYqEhZBggku8x1clRQ" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Visit Developer&#39;s Website</a><a href="http://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.evernote.com&usg=AFQjCNE-NRTbHrz_iYqEhZBggku8x1clRQ" target="_blank" rel="nofollow"class="more-arrow-link"><span class="more-arrow">&rsaquo;</span></a><span class="contact-developer-spacer"></span><a href="http://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.evernote.com/about/privacy/&usg=AFQjCNHDyTSFiwnzTZcxTU8i3AzNWIg42w" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Privacy Policy</a><a href="http://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.evernote.com/about/privacy/&usg=AFQjCNHDyTSFiwnzTZcxTU8i3AzNWIg42w" target="_blank" rel="nofollow"class="more-arrow-link"><span class="more-arrow">&rsaquo;</span></a></div><div class="doc-overview-screenshots"><h2>App Screenshots</h2><div class="screenshot-carousel-button-previous" titles&quot;, what does it even mean?? I suspect Evernote has a team which immediately buries negative reviews by flooding the market with their uniform 5 star reviews.</p><div class="review-footer goog-inline-block"><div class="doc-review-label"></div><div class="per-review-controls goog-inline-block"></div></div></div><hr><div class="doc-review"><span class="doc-review-author"><strong>hannalies</strong></span><span class="doc-review-date"> - July 26, 2012</span> - HTC Incredible 2 with version 4.1.1<span><a href="/store/apps/details?id=com.evernote&amp;reviewId=03989445943433509690"><div class="goog-inline-block review-permalink" title="Link to this review"></div></a></span><div class="doc-review-ratings-line"><div class="ratings goog-inline-block" title="Rating: 5.0 stars (Above average)"><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div></div><h4 class="review-title">Lifesaver!!!</h4></div><p class="review-text">This is the app I use the most, multiple times a day!! July 26, 2012</span> - Samsung Galaxy S3 with version 4.1.1<span><a href="/store/apps/details?id=com.evernote&amp;reviewId=10138511180591257567"><div class="goog-inline-block review-permalink" title="Link to this review"></div></a></span><div class="doc-review-ratings-line"><div class="ratings goog-inline-block" title="Rating: 5.0 stars (Above average)"><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div></div><h4 class="review-title">Great app!</h4></div><p class="review-text">Evo 4G: Absolutely my best app for keeping notes! I still write on post-it (baby steps), photograph it, upload to Evernote, &amp; discard. Brilliant!</p><div class="review-footer goog-inline-block"><div class="doc-review-label">&nbsp;</div><div class="per-review-controls goog-inline-block"></div></div></div><hr></div></div></div><div class="num-pagination-control"><div class="num-pagination-page-button num-pagination-previous goog-inline-block" tabindex="0"></div><div class="num-pagination-numbered-page-buttons goog-inline-block"></div><div class="num-pagination-page-button num-pagination-next goog-inline-block" tabindex="0"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="details-tab-3" class="doc-whatsnew padded-content2" style="display:none" data-analyticsId="whatsnew"><h2>What's New</h2><div class="doc-whatsnew-container"><p>What's in this version:</p>Major Android tablet enhancements!<br>- Completely new tablet look and feel<br>New home screen lets you create and find your notes easily<br>- Swipe navigation on tablets<br>Swipe right to jump to the home screen from a note or note list<br>- Space-saving List View on tablets<br>Phone and tablet improvements:<br>- Create sublists<br>Add levels to your lists by tapping the arrows in the formatting bar when the cursor is in an existing list<br></div></div><div id="details-tab-4" class="doc-specs padded-content2" style="display:none" data-analyticsId="permissions"><h2>Permissions</h2><div class="doc-specs-container"><h4 class="doc-permissions-header">This application has access to the following:</h4><div id="doc-permissions-dangerous" class="doc-permissions"><ul class="doc-permissions-list"><li class="doc-permission-group"><span class="doc-permission-group-title">Hardware controls</span><div class="doc-permission-description">record audio</div><div class="doc-permission-description-full">Allows the app to access the audio record path.</div><div class="doc-permission-description">take pictures and videos</div><div class="doc-permission-description-full">Allows the app to take pictures and videos with the camera. This allows the app at any time to collect images the camera is seeing.</div></li><li class="doc-permission-group"><span class="doc-permission-group-title">Your location</span><div class="doc-permission-description">coarse (network-based) location</div><div class="doc-permission-description-full">Access coarse location sources such as the cellular network database to determine an approximate tablet location, where available. Malicious apps may use this to determine approximately where you are. Access coarse location sources such as the cellular network database to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious apps may use this to determine approximately where you are.</div><div class="doc-permission-description">fine (GPS) location</div><div class="doc-permission-description-full">Access fine location sources such as the Global Positioning System on the tablet, where available. Malicious apps may use this to determine where you are, and may consume additional battery power. Access fine location sources such as the Global Positioning System on the phone, where available. Malicious apps may use this to determine where you are, and may consume additional battery power.</div></li><li class="doc-permission-group"><span class="doc-permission-group-title">Network communication</span><div class="doc-permission-description">full Internet access</div><div class="doc-permission-description-full">Allows the app to create network sockets.</div></li><li class="doc-permission-group"><span class="doc-permission-group-title">Your personal information</span><div class="doc-permission-description">read contact data</div><div class="doc-permission-description-full">Allows the app to read all of the contact (address) data stored on your tablet. Malicious apps may use this to send your data to other people. Allows the app to read all of the contact (address) data stored on your phone. Malicious apps may use this to send your data to other people.</div><div class="doc-permission-description">read sensitive log data</div><div class="doc-permission-description-full">Allows the app to read from the system&#39;s various log files. This allows it to discover general information about what you are doing with the tablet, potentially including personal or private information. Allows the app to read from the system&#39;s various log files. This allows it to discover general information about what you are doing with the phone, potentially including personal or private information.</div><div class="doc-permission-description">read calendar events plus confidential information</div><div class="doc-permission-description-full">Allows the app to read all calendar events stored on your tablet, including those of friends or coworkers. Malicious apps may extract personal information from these calendars without the owners&#39; knowledge. Allows the app to read all calendar events stored on your phone, including those of friends or coworkers. Malicious apps may extract personal information from these calendars without the owners&#39; knowledge.</div></li><li class="doc-permission-group"><span class="doc-permission-group-title">Phone calls</span><div class="doc-permission-description">read phone state and identity</div><div class="doc-permission-description-full">Allows the app to access the phone features of the device. An app with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and the like.</div></li><li class="doc-permission-group"><span class="doc-permission-group-title">Storage</span><div class="doc-permission-description">modify/delete USB storage contents modify/delete SD card contents</div><div class="doc-permission-description-full">Allows the app to write to the USB storage. Allows the app to write to the SD card.</div></li><li class="doc-permission-group"><span class="doc-permission-group-title">System tools</span><div class="doc-permission-description">prevent tablet from sleeping prevent phone from sleeping</div><div class="doc-permission-description-full">Allows the app to prevent the tablet from going to sleep. Allows the app to prevent the phone from going to sleep.</div></li></ul></div><div id="doc-permissions-toggle" class="doc-permissions-toggle" data-toggletarget="doc-permissions-safe doc-permissions-show-all doc-permissions-hide"><span id="doc-permissions-show-all" class="toggle-button goog-inline-block">Show all</span><span id="doc-permissions-hide" class="toggle-button toggle-button-hide goog-inline-block" style="display:none">Hide</span></div><div id="doc-permissions-safe" class="doc-permissions" style="display:none"><ul class="doc-permissions-list"><li class="doc-permission-group"><span class="doc-permission-group-title">Your accounts</span><div class="doc-permission-description">discover known accounts</div><div class="doc-permission-description-full">Allows the app to get the list of accounts known by the tablet. Allows the app to get the list of accounts known by the phone.</div></li><li class="doc-permission-group"><span class="doc-permission-group-title">Hardware controls</span><div class="doc-permission-description">control vibrator</div><div class="doc-permission-description-full">Allows the app to control the vibrator.</div></li><li class="doc-permission-group"><span class="doc-permission-group-title">Network communication</span><div class="doc-permission-description">view network state</div><div class="doc-permission-description-full">Allows the app to view the state of all networks.</div><div class="doc-permission-description">view Wi-Fi state</div><div class="doc-permission-description-full">Allows the app to view the information about the state of Wi-Fi.</div></li><li class="doc-permission-group"><span class="doc-permission-group-title">Default</span><div class="doc-permission-description">Market billing service</div><div class="doc-permission-description-full">Allows the user to purchase items through Market from within this application</div></li></ul></div></div></div></td></tr></table></div><div id="footer"><a
